level.text: There is established the CTE Grant Program Fund, which shall be administered by OSSE in accordance with subsections (c) and (d) of this section.
The Fund shall consist of the revenue from the following sources:
Grants, gifts, or subsidies from public or private sources.
Except as provided in subsection (d) of this section, the Fund shall be used solely for the purposes set forth in § 38-2611(a).
The OSSE shall not use more than 5% of the funds in the Fund to pay the administrative expenses associated with managing the CTE grant program.
The money deposited into the Fund, and interest earned, shall not revert to the unrestricted fund balance of the General Fund at the end of a fiscal year, or at any other time.
Subject to authorization by Congress, any funds appropriated in the Fund shall be continually available without regard to fiscal year limitation.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 38-2601.02 and § 38-2602.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2014 amendment by D.C. Law 20-87 added this section.
